entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 11:28 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: S 30 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
